questions.label: Does your business operate from or use vehicles?
questions.helpText: This questionnaire is designed for businesses that operate or use vehicles as part of their work.

positiveMessage.title: You're in the right place
positiveMessage.body: This survey will help you identify ways to improve safety, security, and management of your business vehicles.

recommendation.title: This survey may not apply
recommendation.body: This survey is for businesses that use vehicles. We recommend completing the Property Safety or Staff Safety questionnaire instead.

questions.label: Are your vehicles fitted with any of the following security features?

positiveMessage.title: Layered security in place
positiveMessage.body: Great security starts with layered protection. Having multiple security features makes vehicles harder to steal and deters opportunistic crime.

recommendation.title: Strengthen vehicle security
recommendation.body: Consider installing additional security features for any items marked 'No' or 'Unsure'. Multiple barriers significantly reduce theft risk.

subQuestions.label: Steering wheel lock
subQuestions.helpText: A device that prevents the steering wheel from turning, making the vehicle difficult to drive.

subQuestions.label: Wheel or brake lock
subQuestions.helpText: Locks the wheel or brake disc to prevent vehicle movement.

subQuestions.label: Brake pedal lock
subQuestions.helpText: Prevents the brake pedal from operating normally, stopping the vehicle from being driven.

subQuestions.label: Engine immobiliser
subQuestions.helpText: Prevents the engine from starting without the correct key or electronic signal.

subQuestions.label: GPS tracker
subQuestions.helpText: Allows real-time tracking and recovery of vehicles if stolen.

subQuestions.label: Dash cam
subQuestions.helpText: Records driving footage and provides evidence in accidents or incidents.

questions.label: Are your vehicles well maintained and regularly serviced?
questions.helpText: Regular servicing ensures vehicles remain safe, reliable, and compliant.

positiveMessage.title: Strong maintenance practices
positiveMessage.body: Well-maintained vehicles improve safety, reduce breakdowns, and reflect professionalism.

recommendation.title: Improve maintenance routines
recommendation.body: Create a regular servicing schedule and record maintenance checks for tyres, brakes, lights, and fluids.

questions.label: Are vehicles stored in a safe, locked, and well-lit area when not in use?

positiveMessage.title: Secure vehicle storage
positiveMessage.body: Secure storage protects vehicles from theft, vandalism, and damage.

recommendation.title: Secure storage needed
recommendation.body: Use locked gates, garages, lighting, and consider CCTV where vehicles are parked overnight.

questions.label: Does the vehicle storage location have CCTV coverage?

positiveMessage.title: CCTV adds protection
positiveMessage.body: CCTV deters crime and provides evidence if an incident occurs.

recommendation.title: Consider CCTV
recommendation.body: Install cameras covering entry points and parking areas, with clear signage and secure footage storage.

questions.label: Are vehicles kept locked when not in use?

positiveMessage.title: Good security habit
positiveMessage.body: Locking vehicles helps prevent theft and unauthorised access.

recommendation.title: Lock vehicles consistently
recommendation.body: Ensure all staff lock vehicles even during short stops.

questions.label: Are keys stored in a safe, out-of-sight location?

positiveMessage.title: Keys stored securely
positiveMessage.body: Secure key storage prevents misuse and theft.

recommendation.title: Improve key security
recommendation.body: Use locked cabinets and restrict access to authorised staff.

questions.label: Do staff travel to remote areas with limited phone or internet coverage?

positiveMessage.title: Remote travel identified
positiveMessage.body: Recognising remote travel risks is an important safety step.

recommendation.title: Plan for remote safety
recommendation.body: Always have travel plans, check-ins, and emergency procedures in place.

questions.label: Do staff receive additional training for remote or emergency situations?

positiveMessage.title: Well prepared staff
positiveMessage.body: Training improves confidence and safety during remote travel.

recommendation.title: Provide remote safety training
recommendation.body: Include first aid, breakdown response, and emergency scenarios.
